channel.title: Update command please?
channel.description: Can someone please help me in making an update command, that kicks all players, shuts down the server and restarts it? also puts the update in 0:00 in the corner? please help

item.title: Update command please?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:5, topic:200648”][quote author=stormcutter link=topic=265281.msg2192767#msg2192767 date=1208416453]

[code]
}

    if ((playerRights >= 3) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ur name")) {

        if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
            PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(
                    command.substring(7))
                            + 1);
            PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
            PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
            PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();[/code]

here it is anyways…

[/quote]

Knowing what you’re copying from your server, and knowing what is correct is key in answering questions.

if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerName.eqaulsIgnoreCase("yourname")) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/quote]

lol tico!! what a GangstahH! lol

Read full topic
